Back to Olivier Messiaen

Olivier Messiaen

Des canyons aux étoiles

1971–1974

[Wikipedia]

Total duration: 15' 30"

  • 4. Le Cossyphe d’Heuglin
  • 9. Le Moqueur polyglotte

Des canyons aux étoiles is an orchestral work in twelve movements. The fourth and ninth movements are for solo piano only.

Recommended editions

  • Alphonse Leduc · A. L. 25313 [nos. 1–5]
  • Alphonse Leduc · A. L. 25314 [nos. 6–7]
  • Alphonse Leduc · A. L. 25315 [nos. 8–12]
  • Alphonse Leduc · A. L. 27607 [nos. 1–12, solo piano part]

4. Le Cossyphe d’Heuglin

Duration: 4' 30"

Difficulty: 4.5

9. Le Moqueur polyglotte

Duration: 11'

Difficulty: 5
